local_schema.short_desc: The default amount of time to dim the screen after idle
local_schema.longdesc: The default amount of time to dim the screen after idle.

local_schema.short_desc: Dim the screen after a period of inactivity when on battery power
local_schema.longdesc: If the screen should be dimmed to save power when the computer is idle when on battery power.

local_schema.short_desc: Dim the screen after a period of inactivity when on AC power
local_schema.longdesc: If the screen should be dimmed to save power when the computer is idle when on AC power.

local_schema.short_desc: The brightness of the screen when idle
local_schema.longdesc: This is the laptop panel screen brightness used when the session is idle. Only valid when use_time_for_policy is true.
If the screen brightness should be changed when switching between AC and battery power.

local_schema.short_desc: Method used to blank screen on battery
local_schema.longdesc: The DPMS method used to blank the screen when on battery power. Possible values are "standby", "suspend" and "off".

local_schema.short_desc: Method used to blank screen on AC
local_schema.longdesc: The DPMS method used to blank the screen when on AC power. Possible values are "standby", "suspend" and "off".

local_schema.short_desc: LCD dimming amount when on battery
local_schema.longdesc: The amount to dim the brightness of the display when on battery power. Possible values are between 0 and 100.
The brightness of the display when on AC power. Possible values are between 0 and 100.

local_schema.short_desc: Reduce the backlight brightness when on battery power
local_schema.longdesc: If the screen should be reduced in brightness when the computer is on battery power.
